desc.p: This is a multi valued field. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the EU.CONVERSION.PARAM file.
A maximum of 10 characters may be entered.
The following values are permitted: LOCAL ACCOUNT
This is a multi valued field. This is a sub valued language field. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
A maximum of 30 characters may be entered.
